verses.verse: The <S%G3588><s%> Elder <S%G4245><s%> To The Elect <S%G1588><s%> Lady <S%G2959><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5043><s%> Her Children, <S%G846><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Love 25 V-PAI-1S-C In 1722 PREP Truth, 225 N-DSF And 2532 CONJ Not 3756 PRT-N I 1473 P-1NS Only, 3441 A-NSM But 235 CONJ Also 2532 CONJ All 3956 A-NPM Those Who 3588 T-NPM Have Known 1097 V-RAP-NPM The 3588 T-ASF Truth, 225 N-ASF

For Sake Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Abides <S%G3306><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Us, <S%G2254><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Forever. <S%G165><s%>

Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> Mercy, <S%G1656><s%> Peace, <S%G1515><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> God The <S%G2316><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> From The <S%G3844><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Love. <S%G26><s%>

I Rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> Exceedingly <S%G3029><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I Have Found <S%G2147><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5043><s%> Thy Children <S%G4675><s%> Walking <S%G4043><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Truth, <S%G225><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> Commandment <S%G1785><s%> We Received <S%G2983><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> I Beseech <S%G2065><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> Lady, <S%G2959><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Commandment <S%G1785><s%> I Write <S%G1125><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> New, <S%G2537><s%> But <S%G235><s%> That Which <S%G3739><s%> We Were Having <S%G2192><s%> ' From The <S%G575><s%> Beginning, <S%G746><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> We Should Love <S%G25><s%> One Another. <S%G240><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> We Should Walk <S%G4043><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1785><s%> His Commandments. <S%G846><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Commandment, <S%G1785><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> Ye Heard <S%G191><s%> ' From The <S%G575><s%> Beginning, <S%G746><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Ye Might Walk. <S%G4043><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Deceivers <S%G4108><s%> Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Do Not Confess <S%G3670><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Deceiver <S%G4108><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Antichrist. <S%G500><s%>

See To <S%G991><s%> Yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> We May Lose <S%G622><s%> What Things <S%G3739><s%> We Wrought, <S%G2038><s%> But <S%G235><s%> A Reward <S%G3408><s%> Full <S%G4134><s%> We May Receive. <S%G618><s%>

Anyone <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Transgresses, <S%G3845><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Abides Not <S%G3306><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Teaching <S%G1322><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Has. <S%G2192><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Abides <S%G3306><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Teaching <S%G1322><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> , Christ, <S%G5547><s%> This One <S%G3778><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Has. <S%G2192><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Teaching <S%G1322><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Does Not Bring, <S%G5342><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Do Not Receive <S%G2983><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Into The <S%G1519><s%> House, <S%G3614><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hail! <S%G5463><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Say Not; <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For He Who <S%G1063><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Hail! <S%G5463><s%> Partakes <S%G2841><s%> In <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Evil. <S%G4190><s%>

Many Things <S%G4183><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> To Write, <S%G1125><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Would Not <S%G1014><s%> With <S%G1223><s%> Paper <S%G5489><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ink; <S%G3188><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Hope <S%G1679><s%> To Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> To Speak, <S%G2980><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> <S%G5600><s%> May Be Full. <S%G4137><s%>
Salute <S%G782><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sister <S%G79><s%> Of Thine <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Elect. <S%G1588><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
